text: 2006–07 Polish Volleyball League was the 71st season of Polish Championship (7th season as professional league) organized by Professional Volleyball League SA () under the supervision of Polish Volleyball Federation (). Jadar Radom and Delecta Bydgoszcz were promoted to Polish Volleyball League in this season. In season 2006/2007 BOT Skra Bełchatów played in CEV Champions League, Wkręt-met Domex AZS Częstochowa played in CEV Top Teams Cup, PZU AZS Olsztyn and Jastrzębski Węgiel played in CEV Challenge Cup, BOT Skra Bełchatów achieved 3rd title of Polish Champion. ==Play–offs== ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2007–08 CEV Champions League |- |width=10px bgcolor=#bbebff| ||Qualified for the 2007–08 CEV Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#e6f8ff| ||Qualified for the 2007–08 CEV Challenge Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFE7E7| ||Play-offs with the 2nd team of 1st league |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFCCCC| ||Relegation to the 1st league |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=290|Team |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|BOT Skra Bełchatów |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|Jastrzębski Węgiel |- bgcolor=#bbebff | |align=left|PZU AZS Olsztyn |- bgcolor=#bbebff |4 |align=left|Wkręt-met Domex AZS Częstochowa |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff |5 |align=left|Asseco Resovia Rzeszów |- |6 |align=left|Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle |- |7 |align=left|Jadar Radom |- |8 |align=left|AZS Politechnika Warszawska |- bgcolor=#FFE7E7 |9 |align=left|Delecta Bydgoszcz |- bgcolor=#FFCCCC |10 |align=left|Gwardia Wrocław |- |} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !2007 Polish Champions |- |BOT Skra Bełchatów 3rd title |} {| style="text-align: center; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- |Maciej Dobrowolski, Mariusz Wlazły, Krzysztof Stelmach, Piotr Gruszka, Janne Heikkinen, Daniel Lewis, Evgeni Ivanov, Paweł Maciejewicz, Robert Milczarek, Radosław Wnuk, Bartłomiej Neroj, Krzysztof Ignaczak, Michał Chadała |- |Head Coach |- |Daniel Castellani |} ==References== Category:Polish Championship of men's volleyball seasons
